thread.title: Secound Aloft in two months
thread.title_full: Secound Aloft in two months - Review of Aloft London Excel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AAEP999
title: Secound Aloft in two months
text:
Had a late meeting in london in Stratford .So Booked the aloft after a pleasant experience in the aloft Munich.parking is ample and location is on the doorstep of the excel exhibition centre. There is a charge for parking as expected .Check in was straight forward. I was upgraded and the room , well spacious ,Nespresso machine ,shower spotless.The bed was king size and again firm supportive mattress.Soundproofing was evident considering I am a insomniac.
Breakfast was excellent good variety and the view from the even though the weather was overcast was calming .To conclude top marks service cleanliness.staff jeppe,Mia and William are very professional and polite .
